dict.acceptation: 态度，看法；[戏剧]（表演时的）姿势；

sent.orig: The aerocraft attitude control is divided into two parts: attitude stabilization and attitude track.
sent.trans: 本文将飞行器姿态控制分为：姿态稳定和姿态跟踪两种情况加以研究。

sent.orig: Conning error is a principle error of strapdown attitude algorithm, which degrades the attitude precision greatly.
sent.trans: 圆锥误差是影响捷联惯导系统姿态算法精度的原理性误差，其对三轴激光捷联惯导系统精度的影响显著。

sent.orig: The Attitude Control System (ACS) software is responsible for maintaining the attitude of the spacecraft.
sent.trans: 姿态控制系统(ACS)软件负责维护航空器的姿态。

sent.orig: ADI, Attitude Direction Indicator, An electronic display of airplane attitude inFORMation in pitch and roll.
sent.trans: 姿态指引仪，用来显示飞机的俯仰姿态和坡度的电子显示。

sent.orig: Sometimes it a help to use you-attitude instead of I-attitude.
sent.trans: 有时第二人称比第一人称更有助于做到这些。
